Source.Name: smartmontools
Source.Summary: smartmontools to check S.M.A.R.T information on harddrives/SSD
Source.Description: The smartmontools package contains two utility programs (smartctl and smartd) to control and monitor storage systems using the Self-Monitoring, Analysis and Reporting Technology System (SMART) built into most modern ATA/SATA, SCSI/SAS and NVMe disks
